content.rendered:
Our lender resource division provides a single source to support the settlement of your purchase, refinance, REO, reverse mortgage and equity transactions. Offering national coverage and a range of residential and commercial settlement services, we are ready to handle your title needs. Our dedicated team of professionals is here in a timely and efficient manner. With great attention to detail, our team will treat your transaction as if it were their very own. Each of our customers is guided step-by-step through the title transaction by an assigned escrow team to ensure a seamless experience from lender application to closing.

National Ability with a Texas Specialization

Although we can serve you in all 50 states, our footprint and specialization are here in Texas. Whether you’re looking to close a loan in Dallas, Houston, Austin or even the small town of Utopia, Texas, Allegiance Title is your source for statewide lender title services. Because Texas is a unique and challenging title market, we seek out title professionals with years of experience working in-depth with lenders through every aspect of the title workflow process. This level of expertise is helpful in identifying and avoiding market-specific obstacles that could potentially offset the title closing timeline.

We aim to enhance the borrower experience through great customer service and consistent results. Anytime, anywhere, our team is looking forward to working with you.
